select st.id serve_type_id, st.name serve_type_name, s1.id serve_item_id, serve.update_time, serve.sale_status, s1.reference_price, serve.create_time, serve.region_id, serve.price, serve.id, serve.is_hot from serve inner join serve_item s1 on serve.serve_item_id = s1.id inner join serve_type st on s1.serve_type_id = st.id
where region_id = #{regionId}
